summary: Hedgehogs are small, spiky mammals found in Europe, Asia, Africa, and New Zealand. There are many different types, called species, of hedgehogs. They are related to shrews and have been around for millions of years. Hedgehogs are mostly active at night, which is called being nocturnal. Their spikes help protect them, like porcupines and echidnas. There were once hedgehogs in North America, but they are now extinct there.
title: Hedgehog
